cu.explanation_en: Setting the remote SCTP port for CU to an out-of-range value (99999) will cause SCTP connection failure and prevent F1 interface establishment.

du.explanation_en: Setting p0_NominalWithGrant to an out-of-range value (100 dBm) will cause invalid power configuration and uplink transmission failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 p0_NominalWithGrant 設定為超出範圍的值 (100 dBm)，會導致無效的功率配置，並造成上行鏈路傳輸失敗。
